name: @synesthesia-project/precise-audio
description: An audio playing API with precise seeking and timestamps
author: Sam Lanning <sam@samlanning.com>

scripts.typedoc: typedoc --json api.json src/index.ts --module commonjs --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludeExternals && type2docfx api.json ../site/api/precise-audio
